Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor to continuously track the health and performance of Azure Disk Storage. Identify and resolve any anomalies or performance issues.
Ensure all Azure Disk Storage is encrypted using Azure Disk Encryption or server-side encryption with customer-managed keys (CMK). Regularly review encryption settings.
Schedule regular backups of Azure Disk Storage using Azure Backup or other backup solutions. Verify the integrity of backups periodically.
Analyze disk usage and capacity trends to ensure adequate storage availability. Plan for scaling or resizing disks as needed.
Regularly audit access permissions for Azure Disk Storage to ensure compliance with security policies. Remove unnecessary or outdated permissions.
Conduct failover and recovery tests to validate disaster recovery plans for Azure Disk Storage. Ensure data can be restored in case of failure.
Review and update storage policies, including retention, encryption, and access policies, to align with organizational requirements and compliance standards.
Analyze disk performance metrics and implement optimizations, such as resizing or changing disk types, to improve efficiency and reduce costs.
Ensure all operational procedures, configurations, and troubleshooting guides for Azure Disk Storage are up-to-date and accessible.
Perform security incident drills to prepare for potential breaches or vulnerabilities in Azure Disk Storage. Validate response protocols.
Evaluate Azure Disk Storage SLAs to ensure compliance with performance and availability metrics. Address any deviations or concerns.
Develop and execute plans for upgrading Azure Disk Storage to newer versions or higher performance tiers as needed.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new Azure Disk Storage features and best practices.
Regularly validate the integrity and usability of disk snapshots to ensure they can be used for recovery or cloning purposes.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding Azure Disk Storage performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
